title: Saona Island Paradise
description: Escape to Saona Island, a pristine Caribbean paradise with crystal-clear turquoise waters and powdery white sand beaches. This full-day excursion includes a catamaran ride, beach time, snorkeling, and a delicious Dominican lunch buffet. Swim in the natural pool, relax under palm trees, and experience the untouched beauty of this protected national park.
notes: ["Bring swimwear, towel, sunscreen, and camera","Wear comfortable shoes","Not recommended for pregnant women or people with back problems","Minimum 2 people required"]
Bring swimwear, towel, sunscreen, and camera
Not recommended for pregnant women or people with back problems

title: Buggy Adventure Tour
description: Get your adrenaline pumping on this exciting buggy adventure through the Dominican countryside! Drive through muddy trails, visit a traditional Dominican home, swim in a cenote, and explore Macao Beach. This half-day tour combines adventure, culture, and natural beauty for an unforgettable experience.

notes: Minimum age 18 to drive, 6 to ride
Bring change of clothes and towel

title: Catalina Island Snorkeling
description: Discover the vibrant underwater world of Catalina Island, one of the best snorkeling spots in the Dominican Republic. This tour takes you to pristine coral reefs teeming with colorful tropical fish, sea turtles, and rays. Enjoy a beach BBQ lunch and relax on the beautiful island beach.

title: Santo Domingo City Tour
tagline: Explore the oldest city in the Americas
description: Immerse yourself in history with a visit to Santo Domingo, the first city established in the Americas. Walk through the Colonial Zone, a UNESCO World Heritage site, visit the first cathedral, the Alc치zar de Col칩n, and the National Pantheon. This full-day cultural experience includes round-trip transportation, a delicious Dominican lunch, and a professional guide to share the rich history of the island.

notes: Dress code: shoulders and knees covered for Cathedral
Long bus ride (approx. 2.5 hours each way)
